attributes.action: Recognise Gina Miller with a suitable award or place in the Lords.
attributes.background: Her courage and determination ensured that the sovereignty of parliament was confirmed by the courts. She has used her personal wealth for philanthropic purposes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
